name: Target Shooting V1.0
description:
My first Oficial Game called: Target Shooting.
A little game that contains the player and many targets.
Hit all the targets to win!
On the end you will have a surprise!

Controls: WASD for movement. Left Mouse Click for Shooting.

when the screen "you win" is showing in the screen, get back to the game page and press "F5". Then you will be able to play it again.

Ass: Davizera123.
(More upgrades Soon...)
